entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:37 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 12:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

Humidity: 74 %

Dewpoint: -10.0°C

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
